member.name: T:UiPath.OCR.Contracts.Activities.IOCRActivity

member.summary: Image to be processed.

member.name: M:UiPath.OCR.Contracts.Activities.IOCRActivity.PerformOCRAsync(System.Drawing.Image,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Processes an image and returns the extracted text information.
member.param: A dictionary of activity arguments having as key the argument name and as value the argument value.

member.name: M:UiPath.OCR.Contracts.Activities.OCRAsyncCodeActivity.BeforeExecute(System.Activities.AsyncCodeActivityContext,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Override this method to compute and provide all the activity input arguments, except for the Image argument. The parameters are null when the engine is called at design time therefore no context is available. Activity input arguments, as a dictionary, where the key is the argument name and the value is the argument value.

member.summary: This method is called after computing the ocr result. Can be used to set output arguments or any other final operations.

member.name: P:UiPath.OCR.Contracts.DataContracts.Character.PolygonPoints
member.summary: Four points, first being the top left corner of the word and the rest are in a clockwise order: top-left, top-right, bottom-right, bottom-left. Required.

member.name: P:UiPath.OCR.Contracts.DataContracts.Word.PolygonPoints
member.summary: Four points, first being the top left corner of the word and the rest are in a clockwise order: top-left, top-right, bottom-right, bottom-left. Required.
